amendment.description: Amendment provides that the EPA must make all scientific and technical information relied upon for rulemaking available online before proposing or finalizing new regulations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 113-626 to mandate that the EPA make all scientific and technical information relied upon for rulemaking available online before proposing or finalizing new regulations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Gosar.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gosar amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
